member.name: T:DHI.Services.WebApiCore.AccountRepository
member.summary: JSON file-based AccountRepository that is located in the App_Data folder.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.WebApiCore.AccountRepository.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:DHI.Services.WebApiCore.AuthenticationController
member.summary: Authentication API.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.WebApiCore.AuthenticationController.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.WebApiCore.AuthenticationController.CreateToken(DHI.Services.WebApiCore.ValidationDTO)
member.summary: Creates a JWT authorization token.
member.response: Illegal password or account not activated.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.WebApiCore.AuthenticationController.Validate(DHI.Services.WebApiCore.ValidationDTO)
member.summary: Performs an account validation.
member.remarks: Checks whether the account exists, the password is correct and the account is activated.
member.response: Illegal password or account not activated

member.name: T:DHI.Services.WebApiCore.ConnectionRepository
member.summary: JSON file-based ConnectionRepository that is located in the App_Data folder.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.WebApiCore.ConnectionRepository.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.WebApiCore.ConnectionsController.Add(Newtonsoft.Json.Linq.JToken)
member.summary: Adds a new connection.
member.remarks: The connection representation must define the connection type using the $type property.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.WebApiCore.ConnectionsController.Update(Newtonsoft.Json.Linq.JToken)
member.summary: Updates an existing connection.
member.remarks: The connection representation must define the connection type using the $type property.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.WebApiCore.ConnectionsController.Delete(System.String)
member.summary: Deletes the connection with the specified identifier.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.WebApiCore.ConnectionsController.Get(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a connection with the specified identifier.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.WebApiCore.ConnectionsController.GetAll
member.summary: Gets a list of all connections.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.WebApiCore.ConnectionsController.GetIds
member.summary: Gets a list of all connection ids.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.WebApiCore.ConnectionsController.GetAllTypes
member.summary: Gets a list of all connection types.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.WebApiCore.ConnectionsController.GetCount
member.summary: Gets the total number of connections.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.WebApiCore.ConnectionsController.GetType(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the connection type with the given identifier.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.WebApiCore.ConnectionsController.GetTypeIds
member.summary: Gets a list of connection type IDs.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.WebApiCore.ConnectionsController.VerifyExisting(System.String)
member.summary: Existing connection verification.
member.remarks: Verifies that an existing connection with the given ID is valid – i.e. that the connection can be established.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.WebApiCore.ConnectionsController.VerifyNew(Newtonsoft.Json.Linq.JToken)
member.summary: New connection verification
member.remarks: Verifies that a new connection is valid – i.e. that the connection can be established. The connection representation must define the connection type using the $type property.

member.summary: Class ConnectionTypeService. This class cannot be inherited.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: A path to look for connection types.
